About Me

Something About me...

BIO

My name is Muhammad Hidayatullah. I am an undergraduate of informatics engineering from the Padang Institute of Technology college, with graduating in 2017. I am a front end programmer using JavaScripts Framework. and I'm always interested in learning new things related to programming and hardware maintenance

IT Support

Troubleshooting

Ensure the computer used by the user can function normally / run as it should, ensure the computer used by the user is connected to the network and can communicate as it should, ensure that all the data the user has The computer cannot be read or retrieved by unauthorized parties without the user's permission, back up all data to be safe and if the system crashes, responsible for supporting machines such as printers, scanners and so on, check and fix any problems with the user's computer network

Engineering

Informathic Engineer

Graphic Design Basics & Concepts, Network Configuration & Concepts, Operating System Installation, Database Basics & Concepts, Create Websites, Domain Configuration & Hosting, Word, Spreadsheets, Presentation Slides, html, javascripts, PHP and Ability & Willingness to Learn New Things

Front End Develop

Graphics Desainer
